com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Class DefaultPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.DefaultObservable
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.ChainedObserver
        • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.DefaultPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer, Element<Step>, Phase
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReconciliationPhase

    public class DefaultPhase
extends ChainedObserver
implements Phase
    The Default Phase implementation tracks Steps both by their UUID and by their ordering. It is an immutable class. A DefaultPhase is an Observable and will forward updates from its steps.
